actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: Regarding the establishment of a free trade area between the United States and the European Community.

summary.text: Urges the President to initiate consultations with the European Community under the authority of the Omnibus Trade and Competitiveness Act of 1988 about negotiating an agreement creating a free trade area between the United States and such Community. Declares that certain waiver provisions relating to requests for negotiations shall not apply.

titles.title: Regarding the establishment of a free trade area between the United States and the European Community.
